comments:
Build 3.2.0

While JUnit tests were running, I selected some text in a Java editor, and performed a copy action. A dialog popped up saying a NPE had occurred, see trace below (from console).

It seems that there got some confusion in dispatch in between the editor thread and the Junit run.

NPE happens when the users executes Edit > Copy when the JUnit view is active, but no test has been selected. I cannot imagine how this could happen when the editor is active. Please file a separate bug if you can reproduce this without the JUnit view having focus.

Fixed in HEAD.
Easiest to reproduce by clicking the Rerun Test button in the JUnit view.

I think I was editing code, then saved/build and ran some JUnit test, which likely gave focus to junit view while I was selecting code in editor.

So your scenario is likely the one I was seeing.
*** Bug 145217 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Will backport the fix in JUnitCopyAction to 3.2.1.
